info.title: THORChain API
info.description:
This documentation outlines the API for THORChain.

NOTE: This document is a **work in progress**.

balance_rune.description: Amount of rune the pool has

balance_asset.description: Amount of asset the pool has

asset.description: the asset of the non-rune asset

pool_units.description: total number of units within the pool

get.description: Retrieve a liquidity pool with the given asset
Retrieve all the liquidity pools from THORChain

get.summary: Get all liquidity providers of a pool
Get a tx with given hash
get.description: Retrieve a tx with the given hash from THORChain

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Tx hash of an inbound transaction or outbound transaction

get.description: Get tx signers that match the request hash

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Tx hash of an inbound transaction or outbound transaction

preflight_status.reason: node account does not have minimum bond requirement: 0/100000000

validator_cons_pub_key.description: the consensus pubkey used by the node

active_block_height.description: block height this node become active

status_since.description: block height this node become current status

signer_membership.description: a list of vault public key that this node is a member of

requested_to_leave.description: indicate whether this node had requested to leave_height

forced_to_leave.description: indicate whether this node had been forced to leave by the network or not, if this field is true , usually means this node had been banned

version.description: the version of thornode software this node is running

slash_points.description: the slash points the node accumulated when they are active , slash points will be reset next time when node become active

release_height.description: on which block height , this node will be released from jail, if it is 0 , means the node is not in jail

reason.description: why the node has been jailed

observe_chains.description: chain and block heights this node is observing , this is useful to know whether a node is falling behind in regards to observing

status.description: what status the node will be in next

reason.description: why the node will be in the status above

get.description: Retrieve the node with given node address from THORChain
Retrieve all nodes that have bond
Retrieve all current active asgard vaults from thorchain
Retrieve all yggdrasil vaults from THORChain

block_height.description: block height when the vault get created

type.description: vault type , it could be asgard or yggdrasil

status.description: status , it could be active , retiring , inactive

status_since.description: block height this vault get to current status

membership.description: a list of node public key , represent which nodes created this vault

chains.description: a list of chains this vault support

inbound_tx_count.description: number of inbound tx to this vault , across all chain

outbound_tx_count.description: number of outbound tx from this vault

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address of the chain, need to match with chain Parameters

get.description: Retrieve all the inbound addresses from THORChain

get.summary: Get last block height per chain
get.description: Retrieve the last block height information about the request chain
Retrieve current network version from THORChain

keygens.description: a list node public keys , indicate who should be part of this keygen

signature.description: base64 encoded signaure of the keygen block
